FuncDef:
The macsec cipher-suite command configures the MACsec encryption algorithm.
The undo macsec cipher-suite command restores the MACsec encryption algorithm.
By default, MACsec uses gcm-aes-128 as the encryption algorithm.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When data packets sent by an interface are encrypted using MACsec, you can configure an encryption algorithm for the interface. By default, MACsec uses gcm-aes-128 as the encryption algorithm. When the interface rate reaches 100 Gbit/s or higher, using the gcm-aes-xpn-128 algorithm is recommended.
